mapper.select: SELECT t.id, tag_name, COUNT(aat.article_id) AS count FROM t_tag t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.id AS article_id, at.tag_id AS tag_id FROM t_article_tag at LEFT JOIN t_article a ON at.article_id = a.id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND a.STATUS in (1, 2) ) aat ON t.id = aat.tag_id GROUP BY t.id
